name: Flappy Wings VR
description:
Remember that game where you play as a bird, and you flap your wings to go up and down to avoid some green obstacles? Now, add the ability to tilt left and right all while being to look around you in 3D space and you get Flappy Wings VR!

You play as a bird (looks a bit like the pokemon noctowl lol) and your goal is to fly as far as possible without colliding into any obstacles!
